William Gear a match affected soundtrack. is on display here. Dev

A woman who hates cats (Alice Krige) and her son (Brian Krause) have moved into a small town, and must deal with a mean cat. The peculiar thing is that the sky sometimes goes entirely black and the ground erupts with boils.
